Comments_List: Good insight into the basics of leadership and management
This course gave me the tools to develop myself as a leader and a future officer. Through the lens of the course material, I learned how to self-evaluate and approach difficult situations.
The topic can be kind of dry other than that it is a really good course.
I really enjoyed the JO Rules and the videos.

This course utilized a wide variety of learning media (books, movies, videos, powerpoints) which helped to keep me engaged. The class size was small, and discussions were frequent and effective. Homework and exams were likewise apropos. This was an ideal course.
Yes! This class was mandatory for ROTC, but I nonetheless looked forward to it and learned a lot from it.
